title: Adults-Only Villa Escape on South Australia’s Stunning Fleurieu Peninsula
description:
Treat yourself to a romantic escape surrounded by the spectacular natural beauty of South Australia’s Fleurieu Peninsula, staying in a luxurious self-contained villa at Seascape Retreat. Unwind amid rolling hills and rugged coastal scenery, with the famed McLaren Vale wine region just 30 minutes' drive away.

Relax in one of just three secluded villas, nestled amid 75 acres of lush nature and offering privacy, spectacular views and luxe facilities. Your escape includes a daily continental breakfast hamper, a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival and a leisurely 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 185 Old Coach Rd, Hindmarsh Valley, Victor Harbor SA 5211
